mapper.update: update book_info set name=#{name}, author=#{author}, publish=#{publish}, ISBN=#{ISBN}, introduction=#{introduction}, language=#{language}, price=#{price}, pub_date=#{pub_date}, class_id=#{class_id}, number=#{number} where book_id=#{book_id}
mapper.select: select bi.*,ci.class_name as className from book_info as bi LEFT JOIN class_info ci on ci.class_id=bi.class_id
